label_name_tooltip: Define the table header, where relevant data can be stored under the corresponding header.
label_description_tooltip: Description of the header field, helping users or AI models understand the table header field
label_type_tooltip: Select the data type corresponding to the stored field
label_required_tooltip_required: Required field: When saving a row of data, the corresponding field information must be provided, otherwise the row cannot be saved
label_required_tooltip_optional: Optional field: When the field information is missing, a row of data can still be saved in the table
validator_name_pattern: Must start with an English letter and can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores
